data.name: VR Paradise - Strippers pack : Emy, Paulina and Lila
data.detailed_description:
Add more content & variety into your VRParadise Stripclub!


A new stripper with three identities to add to your club ( Emy, Paulina and Lila) and to customize.

3 new dances :

Discover three exclusive new dances, more sensual and glamorous than ever!
  • 1 pole dance
  • 1 table dance
  • 1 private dance

6 new outfits specific to these identities available in the original stripclub.

  • White victorian (Miss Mina outfit)
  • Spider webbed
  • Cowgirl fringes
  • Autumn leaves
  • White honeycomp
  • Black shell

2 new outfits specific to these identities available only in Utopia 2089 (DLC).

  • Bright straps
  • Wild interlaces

data.short_description: A new stripper with three identities to add to your club ( Emy, Paulina and Lila) and to customize.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7–7700 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or greater
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
VR Paradise is a virtual striptease club that contains:

- Pole-dances  & table dances with topless dancers.
- Performances in a private room during which the dancers undress completely
